question: Amazon recently partnered with which leading retail Group of India, to deepen its market presence?
explanation:
E-Commerce Giant Amazon recently partnered with the leading retailer, Future Group. By this partnership the Future Group would be allowed to access the online platform of Amazon and Amazon India will be designated as the authorised online store of the Future Retail Ltd (FRL) stores.
This agreement would also deepen the market presence of Amazon in India, while increasing the reach of the Future Groupâ€™s products. Big Bazaar is a famous subsidiary of Future Group.
